content.rendered: Freegames.today is a free games platform. You can play from any device mobile phones, Tablets and desktop computers. Our main goal is for you to have fun! But other than fun we also want to be able to provide educational games and gaming experience without fancy hardware and expansive subscription. We are working with most of the game publishers around the world and aggregating the best games categories such as strategy, RPG, Puzzles , Driving, shooting, and brain teasers. Most of our games are HTML5 based but also Unity and other technologies. we try to make sure to post games that are available to play on all devices and operating systems (browser games). We post at least one new game, you are invited to visit us at any time and explore new games.
